content:
Tim Abbott said:

Vlad Korobov said:

1. Collapsed compose box

The main button looks like an input. Doesn't look disabled. There is a link to Drafts.

image.png

This is unrelated to any one specific element, I just wanted to say: this design looks really slick (I haven't really seen many screencaps of the redesign project yet, just a few here and there, like in Tim's message here), props to Vlad & co. working on it :smile: Slick, but not a distractingly overwhelming overhaul to my eye.
Thank you Josh for a compliment. We are still polishing it. Many things will be tuned while implementing.
